article_text: It has created thousands of jobs in the wind industry, provided new income to farmers and kept electricity prices in check for utility customers. Unfortunately, its few enemies are rich and influential in the strong-arm kind of way when it comes to lavishing campaign contributions on lawmakers.

article_summary:
Unfortunately, its few enemies are rich and influential in the strong-arm kind of way when it comes to lavishing campaign contributions on lawmakers.
It has created thousands of jobs in the wind industry, provided new income to farmers and kept electricity prices in check for utility customers.
